results.title: Association of metformin treatment and outcome in adult patients with ITP and pre-existing T2DM.
results.text_hl: This clinical evidence suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy might improve the clinical outcomes of @<m>DISEASE_Purpura_Thrombocytopenic_Idiopathic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016553 @@@ITP@@@.

results.title: Corticosteroids plus metformin versus corticosteroids as front-line treatment for patients with newly diagnosed ITP and pre-existing type 2 diabetes mellitus: A multicentre propensity score-matched study.
